mapper.insert: insert into manager values(seq_mgr_no.nextval,#{mgrId}, #{mgrPw}, #{mgrName}, #{mgrTel}, #{mgrPost}, #{mgrAddr}, #{mgrLevel}, default, sysdate)
mapper.select: select mgr_no as mgrNo ,mgr_id as mgrId ,mgr_pw as mgrPw ,mgr_name as mgrName ,mgr_tel as mgrTel ,mgr_post as mgrPost ,mgr_addr as mgrAddr ,mgr_level as mgrLevel ,mgr_status as mgrStatus ,mgr_enroll_date as mgrEnrollDate from manager
